column4:
['Are hamka kaa samjhat', '
Ho kaa kaha kaa samajhat ho', '
Are hamka aisa waisa naa', '
Samjho ham bade kam kee chiz', '
Hamka aisa waisa naa samjho', '
Ham bade kam kee chiz', '
O babu bade kam kee chiz', '
Kaun bura hai kaun bhala hai', '
Arekaun bura hai kaun', '
Bhala hai hamko hai tamiz', '
Hamka aisa waisa naa', '
Samjho ham bade kam kee chiz', '
O babu bade kam kee chiz', 'Are ek din ham gaye jungle ma', '
Are ek din ham gaye jungle ma', '
Uhan mil gaye hamka daku', '
Sasura mil gaye hamka daku', '
Kisike hath ma barcha', '
Bhala kisike hath ma chaku', '
Haa ha kisike hath ma chaku', '
Hamne puchha are hamne puchha', '
Kitne ho tum tab woh bole das', '
Ham kaha bas kaa kaha bas', '
Aisa hath jamaya do gaj', '
Dharti ma gaye dhas dhas dhas', '
Hamka aisa waisa naa samjho', '
Ham bade kam kee chiz', '
Hamka aisa waisa naa samjho', '
Ham bade kam kee chiz', '
O babu bade kam kee chiz', 'Are ik din apne ganv ma', '
Are ik din apne ganv ma ik', '
Mem shehar se aayi', '
Ik mem shehar se aayi', '
Dekhke apni mast jawani', '
Mann ma woh muskayi', '
Are mann ma', '
Woh muskayi bade pyar se', '
Bade pyar se usane', '
Hamka diya gulabi phul', '
Ham kaha ee kaa det ho', '
Hamka phul kaa det ho phul', '
Hath jodkar phir woh boli ho', '
Gayi hamse bhul bhul bhul', '
Hamka aisa waisa naa samjho', '
Ham bade kam kee chiz', '
Hamka aisa waisa naa samjho', '
Ham bade kam kee chiz', '
O babu bade kam kee chiz', '
Kaun bura hai kaun bhala hai', '
Arekaun bura hai kaun', '
Bhala hai hamko hai tamiz', '
Hamka aisa waisa naa samjho', '
Ham bade kam kee chiz', '
Babu bade kam kee chiz', '
O babua bade kam kee chiz', '
Samaj gaye naa kyaa kaha', '
Haan.']
